body: Please also refer to the WHO malaria terminology [160] for additional information and notes on the glossary contained here. Definitions not yet captured in the WHO malaria terminology document are indicated with an asterisk.
title: 9 Glossary
recommendation:
All cases of suspected malaria should have a parasitological test (microscopy or Rapid diagnostic test (RDT)) to confirm the diagnosis.
Both microscopy and RDTs should be supported by a quality assurance programme.
Good practice statement
